amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds for the Summer Flounder and Black Sea Initiative project of the Partnership for the Mid-Atlantic Fisheries, Point Pleasant Beach, New Jersey.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 107 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds for the Summer Flounder and Black Sea Initiative project of the Partnership for the Mid-Atlantic Fisheries, Point Pleasant Beach, New Jersey.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 102 - 317 (Roll no. 377).
